title: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the Team entry is missing from the context menu.
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file and another resource in the workspace, the context menu does not display the Team entry.
EB: When opening the context menu, the Team entry should be present, allowing synchronization of the .java file and the other resource.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the workspace containing a .java file and another resource.
2. Right-click on the .java file and the other resource simultaneously.
3. Observe that the context menu does not show the Team entry.
